thread.title: VIDEO: Watch the January Premier League Goal of the Month nominees
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Watch the January Premier League Goal of the Month nominees

title: VIDEO: Watch the January Premier League Goal of the Month nominees
text:
0 Feb 3, 2017 22:44:16 Will it be one of Olivier Giroud or Andy Carroll's acrobatic efforts, or can someone else snatch the award for January's best strike? 
Sensational strikes from Olivier Giroud and Andy Carroll are among the nominees for the January Premier League Goal of the Month. 
Giroud opened the year with a scorpion kick goal against Crystal Palace, while Carroll's bicycle kick against the same opponents two weeks later drew huge plaudits. 
Giroud's team-mate Lucas Perez is also nominated, while Wayne Rooney's record 250th Manchester United goal is included in the shortlist. 
Check out all eight goals below! Will it be a scorpion, bicycle or another January worldie that wins the Carling Goal of the Month Award? Vote now https://t.co/F5CYT5fgBA pic.twitter.com/lNunedh3Pa 
January's Carling Goal of the Month shortlist 
Olivier Giroud (ARSENAL v Crystal Palace) 1 January Lucas Perez (AFC Bournemouth v ARSENAL) 3 January Andy Carroll (WEST HAM v Crystal Palace) 14 January Marko Arnautovic (Sunderland v STOKE CITY second goal) 14 January Harry Kane (SPURS v West Brom third goal) 14 January Roberto Firmino (LIVERPOOL v Swansea City) 21 January Wayne Rooney (Stoke City v MAN UTD) 21 January David Luiz (Liverpool v CHELSEA) 31 January Related
